message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $120 is unfortunately too low for me.  How about we split the difference at $145?  This would still give you a good deal and help me reach a price that works for me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit too high on the budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?

Bob,  I understand you're on a budget, but $130 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $140. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  If you're serious about getting this, this is our last offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
